entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2 except plus 5 inland.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers and ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2 except plus 5 inland. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
